text: Diawala is a town in the far north of Ivory Coast. It is a sub-prefecture and commune of Ouangolodougou Department in Tchologo Region, Savanes District. Diawala is the birthplace of Guillaume Soro. In 2014, the population of the sub-prefecture of Diawala was 71,054. ==Villages== The 17 villages of the sub- prefecture of Diawala and their population in 2014 are: ==Notes== Category:Sub-prefectures of Tchologo Category:Communes of Tchologo
title: Diawala
